short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks ads on various online movie streaming websites and adds some features to them.
short.ro: Blocheaza reclamele de pe site-uri de seriale si adauga facilitati suplimentare.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blocks ads on various online movie streaming websites. Feel free to request other to be added!

If you would like to help, here is the donation link: https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=DD5XH4X4ZYXDN
long.ro:
Aceasta extensie blocheaza reclamele de pe 990.ro si adauga facilitati suplimentare:
- Buton pentru episodul urmator/anterior
- Marcheaza in mod automat episoadele ca si vizionate
- Utilizarea tastaturii pentru navigarea intre rezultatele cautarii

Daca doriti sa contribuiti, acesta este linkul catre donatii: https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=DD5XH4X4ZYXDN
